title.rendered: INTECH solidifies its O&M presence in GCC region with the award of control system packages preventive maintenance services contract

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH’s O&M success in the GCC region continues as it wins a project for providing on-call preventive maintenance, repair, and technical support services for multi-vendor process control system packages (PLC/RTU/ESD/SCADA).

INTECH emerged as a clear winner for this project on the back of its stellar record in global O&M services, strong local presence in the GCC region, and the multi-vendor expertise experience of its O&M team.

The client is working on increasing its production to meet local demand by tapping unconventional reserves. INTECH’s scope of services includes:

  • Preventive Maintenance Routines as recommended by the OEM’s latest publications
  • Inspection of Control system packages and marshaling cabinets
  • Firmware upgrade for PLC, Communication, and I/O modules
  • Software patch updates for SCADA and HMI
  • Diagnostic checks for PLC/RTU/ESD/SCADA

How we are responding to COVID 19: We are ensuring that our services and business agreements are executed to the satisfaction of our clients and partners without exposing anyone to COVID 19. Our factories are operational with significant new safety measures. We have devised a global COVID 19 plan that covers international movement, precautions, behavioral changes, and contingency & emergency response options for all our business regions.

If you are an INTECH client and have not received information about our business continuity plans, please feel free to reach out to an INTECH account manager or project manager.

About INTECH’s O&M Solutions

INTECH’s O&M services provide long-term asset healthcare, maintenance, and upgrades ensuring sustained operation of assets for their planned life and beyond. Our project experiences help us gain valuable knowledge of systems, improving our learning curve in comparison to a third-party O&M provider, thereby reducing O&M risks & costs. With INTECH’s diverse expertise in control systems and oil & gas applications, we also help reduce the hassle of managing multiple vendors for any O&M situation. A single INTECH resource is skilled at handling multiple systems – saving both finances and time.

For more information visit: https://www.intechww.com/products-and-solutions/operations-and-maintenance/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation Inc. is an international Control Systems engineering and Systems Integration company delivering reliable automation solutions to the Oil & Gas sector since 1991. INTECH has done projects in 31 countries across 6 continents with regional offices in 13 countries, equipping it with 2000+ engineering man-years of experience. INTECH’s vendor-neutral approach and extensive experience help serve both regional and global customers with the highest standards of quality and reliability.

INTECH covers all traditional asset classes (upstream, midstream & downstream) as well as shale and buoy automation. Its wide range of solutions covers traditional control system automation as well as hydraulic (surface and sub-surface) control system automation and advanced software solutions for operations and asset management. Customers benefit from INTECH’s lump-sum turnkey solutions to save costs and increase plant productivity.

For more information, visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
